description:
Doomseeker is a cross-platform server browser for Doom.

The goal of Doomseeker is to provide a smooth, consistant experience for Doom players regardless of port or platform.

Doomseeker provides support for Chocolate Doom, Odamex, Sonic Robo Blast 2, Turok 2 Remaster, and Zandronum.

With its plugin system support for even more can be added.
author: Blzut3 Zalewa
